ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 182
ygData.msgSnippet: ... that. ... There is an application out there you can use... if i find the link I will send it on. Anyone else have it handy? ... Actually I found it about
ygData.messageBody:
> I've heard that you can hex edit the Tutorial.exe so that you can view any
> zone in the game free of mobs. I was just wondering how exactly you do
that.
> What files to open with what, which lines of code to replace, etc. Thanks
> in advance.


There is an application out there you can use... if i find the link I will
send it on. Anyone else have it handy?
>>

Actually I found it about 10 minutes after I sent the mail (isn't that always the way?) Just FYI for the rest of you.. in HackersQuest's FAQ they give you directions on how to modify the tutorial, and a link to a hex editor that you need to do it. Or, if you want to do it the easy way, they also have a link for a program that does it all for you. I suggest copying the tutorial and renaming it so you can keep the original if you mess it up somehow, tho if you're paying attention it really isn't tough to do. Here's the link:

http://www.hackersquest.gomp.ch/html/faq.shtml#2
